import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../styles/header.css'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { cartUiAction } from '../store/cartUi-Slice'; const NAV__MENU = [ { text: 'Home', path: '/home', }, { text: 'About', path: '/about', }, { text: 'Car Listing', path: '/car-listing', }, { text: 'Blog', path: '/blogs', }, { text: 'Contact', path: '/contact', }, ]; const Header = () => { const menuRef = useRef(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const totalQuantity = useSelector(state => state.cart.totalQuantity); const cartShowToggle = () => { dispatch(cartUiAction.toggle()); }; const menuToggle = () => menuRef.current.classList.toggle('menu__active'); return (
Need Help? Call: +91 12345 67890
Login Register

{' '} Rent Car
Service

Bangladesh

, Bangladesh

Sunday to Friday

10am - 7pm
{NAV__MENU.map((item, index) => ( navClass.isActive ? 'active me-4 ' : 'me-4' } key={index} to={item.path} > {item.text} ))}
{totalQuantity}
); }; export default Header;
